content.en: Algorithmic optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to evaluate and compare different techniques for maximizing the power output of photovoltaic systems. They are also using algorithms to simulate and optimize specific algorithms, such as the Perturb and Observe (P&O) method, in grid applications. Additionally, algorithms are being developed and assessed for their performance in controlling power conditioning units and tracking the maximum power point in PV systems.
content.da: Algoritmisk optimering: Forskere anvender algoritmer til at evaluere og sammenligne forskellige teknikker for at maksimere effektudbyttet af fotovoltaiske systemer. De bruger også algoritmer til at simulere og optimere specifikke algoritmer, såsom Perturb and Observe (P&O) metoden, i netapplikationer. Derudover udvikles og vurderes algoritmer for deres ydeevne i styring af effektkonditioneringsenheder og sporing af maksimal effektpunkt i PV-systemer.
